subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Arizona’s Dwight Freeney stripped the ball from Teddy Bridgewater with five seconds to play as Minnesota was driving for a potential tying field goal, and the Cardinals won, 23-20.
snippet: Arizona’s Dwight Freeney stripped the ball from Teddy Bridgewater with five seconds to play as Minnesota was driving for a potential tying field goal, and the Cardinals won, 23-20.
